mapper.update: update pro_project set title = #{title} where versionid = #{id}
update pro_project set deletecauses = #{deletecauses},status = 3 where id = #{id}
update pro_project set iterationcauses = #{iterationcauses},status = 2 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from pro_project where title = #{title} and version = #{version}
select * from pro_project where versionid = #{versionid} and version = #{version}
select * from pro_project group by versionid
select * from pro_project where versionid = #{id} order by iterationtime desc

select m.*, (select count(*) from pro_prototype where modularid = m.id and groupstatus = 1) as prototypenum, (select count(*) from pro_task where modularid = m.id ) as tasknum, (select count(*) from pro_test where modularid = m.id ) as testnum, (select count(*) from pro_bug where modularid = m.id ) as bugnum, (select count(*) from pro_design where modularid = m.id) as designnum, (select count(*) from pro_file where modularid = m.id and groupstatus = 1) as filenum from pro_modular m where m.projectid = #{id}
